verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I've found a friend who is all to me, His love is ever true; I love to tell how He lifted me, And what His grace can do for you.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Saved by His pow'r divine, Saved to new life sublime! Life now is sweet and my joy is complete, For I'm Saved, saved, saved!

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: When poor and needy and all alone, In love He said to me, "Come unto Me and I'll lead you home, To live with me eternally."
